api.title: Oops, something went wrong
api.detail: An error has occurred. Please try again later.

branch.title: Visit our branch
branch.detail: We apologize but we cannot open your account in Smart Banka. Visit one of our branches where we will be happy to assist you, or call our helpline for more information.

precontractDisagree.title: We can’t continue without your agreement
precontractDisagree.detail: In order to continue, we need your agreement to Terms and Conditions and the contract Do you have any questions? Let’s talk about it.
precontractDisagree.branch: Visit a branch/find the closest branch

contractDisagree.title: We can’t continue without your agreement
contractDisagree.detail: In order to continue, we need your agreement to Terms and Conditions and the contract Do you have any questions? Let’s talk about it.
contractDisagree.branch: Visit a branch/find the closest branch

acquisitionVerification.title:
Done!
It's our turn now
acquisitionVerification.detail: It usually takes about 10 minutes on business days.You may close the app and continue later.

acquisitionVerificationIntro.title: Identity verification via your camera
detail: We need to make sure that it is really you, and not someone pretending to be you. That is why we need a short video recording of your face.
Simple gestures (moving your head from left to right and smiling) help us get an accurate reading.
The footage is deleted immediately after verification as your privacy and security is our top priority.

acquisitionIntroduction.title: Welcome! In order to continue we need these details:
acquisitionIntroduction.wueTitle: Welcome! We're going to add your Wüstenrot products now:
acquisitionIntroduction.detail: By continuing, I agree that the information may be sent once in an unencrypted manner to the e-mail address and telephone number above. I also acknowledge the privacy policy of the MONETA Financial Group.
acquisitionIntroduction.checkboxMarketing:
Stay in the loop
I consent to personal data processing with the purpose of receiving promotional offers from the MONETA Group. I can unsubscribe at any time. More
acquisitionIntroduction.checkboxUnsecured:
We can communicate easily
I grant the MONETA Group the right to communicate with me in a regular, unencrypted manner via email or phone. More
acquisitionIntroduction.checkboxIM:
We can communicate via chat
I consent to unencrypted communication with the MONETA Group via WhatsApp or other instant messaging platforms. More

instantMessaging.title: Consent to standard communication via WhatsApp, or other instant messaging application.
instantMessaging.detail: I consent to standard communication in the form of unencrypted electronic messages on the WhatsApp platform or other instant messaging platform, which can include information about me or contain information pertaining to the contracts concluded with the companies listed below. The list of the currently used instant messaging platforms can be found at www.moneta.cz. I give consent to MONETA Money Bank, a. s., IN: 256 72 720, MONETA Auto, s.r.o., IN: 601 12 743, MONETA Leasing, s.r.o., IN: 607 51 606 and MONETA Stavební Spořitelna, a.s., IN: 471 15 289. These companies shall communicate with me via the bank’s telephone number +420 224 443 636 and + 420 728 133 133. The consent can be revoked anytime. I confirm that I am familiar with the rules and facts of personal data processing listed in the Personal Data Protection section. This information is available online at www.moneta.cz, www.monetaauto.cz. and www.monetaleasing.cz, or by request from an authorized employee.

acquisitionIntroduction.codeInfo: You can find your authorization code in your email

LOGIN_BLOCKED.title: Something went wrong
LOGIN_BLOCKED.detail: There may be multiple reasons. Call our helpline and we will get to the bottom of it.

OK.title: Something went wrong
OK.detail: There may be multiple reasons. Call our helpline and we will get to the bottom of it.

ACTIVATE_VIA_IB.title: Activate your Smart Banka
ACTIVATE_VIA_IB.detail: To proceed please activate your Smart Banka via Internet Banka.

GO_TO_BRANCH.title: Something went wrong
GO_TO_BRANCH.detail: We are not able to solve it in the app. Visit us at one of our branches.

marketingConsent.title: Consent to marketing communication
marketingConsent.detail: I agree to the processing of my personal data, especially my identification and contact details, information on banking transactions, and data generated during the use of products and services, and other personal information that I have or will share or will otherwise be obtained by the Moneta Group ( MONETA Money Bank, a. s., IČO: 256 72 720, MONETA Auto, s.r.o., IČO: 601 12 743, MONETA Leasing, s.r.o., IČO: 607 51 606 a MONETA Stavební Spořitelna a.s., IČO: 471 15 289) in order to received personalized offers for products and services.

unencryptedCommunication.title: Consent to unencrypted communication
unencryptedCommunication.detail: I agree to communication with the members of the MONETA Group (MONETA Money Bank, a. s., IČO: 256 72 720, MONETA Auto, s.r.o., IČO: 601 12 743, MONETA Leasing, s.r.o., IČO: 607 51 606 a MONETA Stavební Spořitelna a.s., IČO: 471 15 289) via unencrypted electronic or SMS communication which may contain personal details and details related to contracts concluded with the members of the MONETA Group.

personalData.title: Consent to personal data processing
personalData.detail: In order to conclude the contract, it is necessary to process your personal data in order to prepare the contractual documentation, verify your credibility and payment behavior, and to protect the interests of the Bank. More information on the processing of your personal data, other purposes for which it may be processed, the legal reasons for their processing and your legal rights can be found in the ‘Information on the processing of personal data’ document which is available at https://www.moneta.cz/ochrana-dat.

acquisitionPrecontract.title: Before login, please read the Smart Banka Mini Contract.
acquisitionPrecontract.checkboxLabel: I read and agree with the Terms and Conditions of Smart Banky Mini.

acquisitionSmsSent.title: Sign with a code that we have just sent to your phone via SMS.

noSMSPopup.title: Have you not received a code?
noSMSPopup.detail: It's okay, you can try to send it again.

errors.SMS_CANNOT_SEND: The SMS could not be sent, please visit us at one of our branches.
errors.SMS_FAILED: The SMS could not be sent, please try again.
errors.SMS_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: You have reached the SMS limit. Please start over from beginning.
errors.BAD_MK: You've entered an invalid code, please try it again.
errors.MK_EXPIRED: The code has expired, send another one
errors.CANNOT_VERIFY: The code could not be verified. Please visit us at one of our branches.

acquisitionPinCreate.title: Choose a PIN you will use to log into Smart Banka.

acquisitionDisagreement.title: We can't continue without your consent
acquisitionDisagreement.detail: You are just a step away from accessing Smart Banka. In order to access it, we need your consent to pre-contractual information and contract signature. Do you have any questions? Let's talk about them.

acquisitionSign.title: Sign the contract with your PIN

documentUpload.title: We need your current ID. Please upload it.
documentUpload.detail: All we need a legible clear photo. You can upload them in the app or visit our branch. The photo upload process is secure.

uploadedDocument.title: Please take a photo of both sides of your ID.

documentUploadRetry.title: Oops, something's wrong
documentUploadRetry.detail: We couldn't read your details. Please make sure the photo is well lit and the text are legible.

helpUploadDocument.title: We need your current ID to continue
helpUploadDocument.detail: As some of your details may have changed, we need your ID to verify them. All we need a legible clear photo. You can upload it in the app or visit our branch. The photo upload process is secure and it only takes a minute. Do you have any questions? Let's talk about them.

scoring.title: Just a moment, the cat needs to look things over.
